attributes.action: Begin trialling IV C for people infected with COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: In the past there were doctors that cured Viral Pneumonia using IV C, and the main risk from the COVID-19 it seems is the Viral Pneumonia. There is absolutely no reason whatsoever why these patients could not be given IV C to help them make a recovery, especially as every single illness brings a depletion of Vitamin C. Indeed in Wuhan they are trialling this and we want the UK to trial it also
attributes.background: People who have a compromised immune system are at risk if they catch the COVID-19 virus and we want the government to try using IV Vitamin C as they are in Wuhan in helping these patients make a recovery

rejection.details: Treatments for coronavirus are a clinical decision for the NHS.
